original_text: Now before this, Eliashib the priest, who was appointed over the chambers of the house of our God, and who was related to Tobiah,
korean_text: 이전에 우리 하나님의 전의 방을 맡은 제사장 엘리아십이 도비야와 연락이 있었으므로

sentences.original_text: who was appointed over the chambers of the house of our God,
sentences.korean_translation: 우리 하나님의 집 곳방들을 맡겨받은 자였는데,

sentences.original_text: and who was related to Tobiah,
